name: Kittypedes!
description:
Kittypedes!

Kittypedes! is my entry for the fourth round of GDKO 2023.

In this round we were tasked with recreating the classic Atari game Centipede. I decided that it would be fun to remake Centipede by way of Smash TV with kitties.

Controls:

WASD to shoot & Arrow keys to move

OR

Arrow Keys to shoot & WASD to move

Credits

Intro Music by Music_Unlimited from Pixabay

"I got a stick" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
